content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I am glad you like the apartment. Now, let's talk about the rental price. Remember, I only want to discuss the rental price, nothing else.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, Mister Schmidt, I understand. Let's focus on the rental price. How much are you looking to rent the apartment for?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I am looking for the highest price possible. Why don't you make an offer? Remember, I only want to discuss the rental price, nothing else.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. As a student, I am looking to keep my expenses low. I would like to offer 500 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is too low for my liking. Let's hear another offer. Remember, I only want to discuss the rental price, nothing else.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I apologize if my initial offer was too low. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. How about 600 Euro per month? This should be more in line with the market value.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think you can do better. Let's hear another offer. Remember, I only want to discuss the rental price, nothing else.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. Let's try again. I'm willing to increase my offer to 700 Euro per month. This should be a fair price for the apartment's location and amenities.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think you can do better. Let's hear another offer. Remember, I only want to discuss the rental price, nothing else.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt, I'll make one final offer. I'm prepared to pay 800 Euro per month for the apartment. This is a generous offer, considering the unfurnished state of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [800] Euro! We have agreed on the rental price, and the negotiation is terminated.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
